app_background.helpText: Ratio: 10:16. Will be displayed using the app or webapp on a smarthpone in portrait mode.

app_launcher_icon.helpText: Has to be an .SVG vector graphic AND the ratio must be 1:1. Will be displayed on your phones home screen to launch your app

app_pc_background.helpText: Will be displayed in the webapp using a pc

app_splashscreen.helpText: Will be displayed during app startup

logo.helpText: Will be displayed on the apps main page

funding_partner_1.helpText: Will be displayed in the funding partner sections

funding_partner_2.helpText: Will be displayed in the funding partner sections

funding_partner_3.helpText: Will be displayed in the funding partner sections

app_sources.helpText: Sources you used to build this app.
